about_the_game:
Chaos Front is the latest game of the Chaos Galaxy series, which has been deeply influenced by Super Robot War, Romance of the Three Kingdoms, Advance War, and other similar games.

The program, art, and design are all completed by one developer alone.

This is a demo version of Chaos Front, containing only the prologue content of the Lycurgus Corps.

Form your mercenary corps, move around the map of Centersea Sector, choose missions and join the war between the powers. Your choices will change the fate of people and the ending of the Centersea War.

Partners, enemies, friends ...... There are many important characters in the game, all with their own stories, identity talents and combat skills, such as commanders, staff officers, merchants, pirates, scientists ...... and even psychics, robots and aliens!

Battleships, submarines, mecha, artillery, fighters...... There are a lot of available units in the game, all with different weapons and abilities.

Units can use a wide range of behaviors such as stealth, space mines, spreading fog, seizing, stealing, ramming, shelling, combating, shields, defensive force fields, and more. We can research the game system to create a powerful army with a variety of different play styles.

We can receive many missions with different story plots at the Mission Centers. It is also possible to participate in battles initiated by the big factions. When we become an ally of a faction, we can even make proposals to the faction to guide its strategic actions.

The Solar Union, the first galaxy regime in human history, was destroyed due to corruption and tyranny during the Great Rebellion. After its fall, the galaxy was divided among three great powers. Unable to defeat each other, eventually, they agreed to a ceasefire and established the Astronautical Committee to manage thousands of independent planets.

Unfortunately, the Astronautical Committee soon became a tool for the three powers to control and exploit the galaxy. Interstellar navigation was restricted, and planets were subjected to economic exploitation.

In the 25th year of the Committee Calendar, a revolution broke out on the planet Massilia in the Centersea Sector. The Committee quickly decided to send fleets from the three powers to suppress the revolutionary planets. However, the Committee Army was weakened due to the defection of the Black Flag, and the front line became a deadlock.

The great powers had to allow the Committee Army to recruit mercenaries to supplement their forces in the war zone. The Revolutionary Army and the Black Flag also began recruiting mercenaries.

Militia, pirates, nobles, and technicians from all over the galaxy rushed to Centersea to join the war. Mercenary groups quickly became a main force in the Centersea warfare.

Under the temptation of wealth and honor, beneath the banner of revolution and freedom, and stirred by hegemony and conspiracy, the Galaxy was falling into a chaotic era...

short_description: This is a demo version of Chaos Front, a turn-based space mecha mercenary game, containing only the prologue content of the Lycurgus Corps. You can recruit pilots and captains, buy spaceships, mechas, take missions, participate in battles between Galactic Powers, and experience stories.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
